hiveArticle.title: Picture Perfect Sky with Clouds
hiveArticle.body:
It was indeed a picture perfect moment because you can see the rays of the sun flowing everywhere in the sky, thus making it an astonishing view. 

I really liked the Zoom In one, but will definitely want your opinion, which one you liked the most and why ? 

## Original Photo - No Editing, No Zoom
![IMG_20171108_171652.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1510208711/sojwu8j1h22mblrbcwh2.jpg)

## Little Zoom In  - No Editing, Zoom 5X
![IMG_20171108_171701.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1510208799/ouekilz8tcskilcykb68.jpg)

## B/W Alternative - Edited to B/W
![IMG_20171108_171652~2.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1510208912/rvhm4mnyrxfqioayygtb.jpg)
